mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_goods ORDER BY goods_no DESC
SELECT * FROM tbl_goods_option ORDER BY goods_no DESC

select * from tbl_goods tg, ( select LISTAGG(goods_size, ',') WITHIN group (order by goods_size) as goods_option_size from tbl_goods_option where goods_no = 'g001' and goods_color = 'black' group by goods_color ), ( select LISTAGG(goods_color, ',') WITHIN group (order by goods_color) as goods_option_color from tbl_goods_option where goods_no = 'g001' and goods_size = 'L' group by goods_size ) where tg.goods_no = 'g001'
SELECT * FROM tbl_goods RIGHT JOIN tbl_goods_option ON tbl_goods.goods_no = tbl_goods_option.goods_no WHERE tbl_goods.goods_no = #{goods_no}
